name: Burning Monkey Mahjong Solitaire
overview: Burning Monkey Mahjong Solitaire is a game in Freeverse's Burning Monkey series which features humorous monkeys telling jokes during game time. Like other mahjong solitaire games, the objective is to clear the board from tiles by matching tiles of the same kind. There are five difficulty levels and 35 different tile layouts. It's also possible to randomly generate new layouts. The game has a built-in hint feature that suggests a pair of tiles that can be matched or to show all tiles that can be matched. It is also possible to undo moves and reshuffle the board.
